text: walard alnqyt 'iidha nazal ealayha almatar tukhrj nbatana -b'idhn allah wmshyyth- tybana mysrana, wkdhlk almumin 'iidha nazalat ealayh ayat allah antfe bha, wathmrt fih hayat salht, 'amaa al'ard alssabikht alradiyat fa'iinaha la tukhrj alnbat 'iilaa esrana rdyya la nfe fyh, wala tukhrj nbatana tybana, wkdhlk alkafir la yntfe biayat allh. mithl dhlk altnwye albdye fi albayan nunwwie alhujaj walbrahyn l'ithbat alhaqu lanas yashkurun nem allh, wytyewnh
